description: Non material amendment to planning permission 19/02780/FUL, Conversion of existing accommodation to create 2 no. additional self contained flats (5no. in total), extension of the existing rear single-storey lean-to addition, replacement of the existing pitched roof over single-storey rear projection with a flat roof and provision of a cycle store).   Internal alterations to alter the previously approved floor layouts
decision_conditions: Reject non-material amendments - the amendments proposed are greater than non-material.

Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B (a) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended) states that an extension to a roof will not be permitted by Class B subject to the condition that the materials used in the any exterior work must be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse.

Please provide a copy of proposed block plan scaled 1:500, providing a scale bar showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site.  The block plan should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.
